ComicInfo.Summary: "LOCKDOWN," Part Three Stronghold prison is under attack! Wolf-Man must now face his most deadly adversary yet! Everything changes as we enter the next stage in Wolf-Man's life - leading up to the monumental issue 25! That is, if Wolf-Man survives the battle.
